text: Carolyn Goldmark Goodman (born March 25, 1939) is an American politician. She became the mayor of Las Vegas, Nevada in 2011. She is the wife of former mayor and attorney Oscar Goodman and the second female mayor of Las Vegas, after Jan Laverty Jones. Goodman was mayor of Las Vegas during the 2017 Las Vegas shooting. On August 3, 2016, Goodman refused to support Hillary Clinton or Donald Trump in the 2016 presidential election. ==References== Category:1939 births Category:Living people Category:Mayors of Las Vegas Category:Politicians from Philadelphia Category:Democratic Party (United States) politicians
title: Carolyn Goodman (politician)
